chapters.title: Chapter 7: The Streets of Caemlyn
chapters.info: Daughter-Heir (of Andor), p. 172 (189)—By Andoran tradition, the first-born daughter of the Queen is her heir to the throne. The Daughter-Heir is traditionally sent to Tar Valon to receive training from the Aes Sedai, although until the current Daughter-Heir, Elayne, most have been too weak to get beyond novice training. See also Trakand, Elayne.
